A6020.changelog:
- Blacklisted google hotword service to fix mic issues
- Enabled audiosphere effect by default
- Fixed FM radio
- Fixed postprocessing daemon crashes
- Misc changes for infra

davinci.changelog:
07/01/2021
-Improved performance and UX by switching to the Pixel Power HAL (libperfmgr)
-Updated blobs from MIUI 20.12.28
05/01/2021
-Upstreamed the kernel to Linux 4.14.213
30/12/2020
-Improved FOD behaviour
-Switched to AOSP Bluetooth
-Updated blobs from MIUI 20.12.26
27/12/2020
-Fixed Styles and Wallpapers crash while using a Live Wallpaper

Notes:
- Recommended required firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Use the Android 10 compatible recoveries, like official TWRP

ginkgo.changelog:

lavender.changelog:

- Redfin FP for January SPL

miatoll.changelog:

mido.changelog:
Note:
- These are still going to continue on 3.18 builds only.
- Requests for 4.9 builds will be ignored.

This decision has been taken as per the equal no.of requests from both sides of the parties and concluded by the outcome of adverse performance affects.

improved  performance

surya.changelog:
- Upstream blobs from MIUI V12.0.8.0.QJGINXM 
- Add proper notch masking overlay to hide camera cutout
- Fix crackling noise while playing some sounds
- Adjust brightness values
- Revamp and organize tree
- Dynamically set power profile according to device model
- Update power HAL to support hints
- Improve and optimize wifi conf
- Performance/Optimization related props
- Added clear speaker option
- Refine parts with updated icons and strings
- Doze functionality improvements
- More translations dump for parts
- Misc fixes and changes

Note:
